unnormalised: A major fire broke out earlier today at a residential building in Andheri West, Mumbai. Initial reports suggest the blaze started around 2:30 PM IST in a flat on the 12th floor of “Shanti Niketan” located at Lokhandwala Complex, Andheri (W), Mumbai- 400053.
normalised: A major fire broke out earlier today at a residential building in Andheri West, Mumbai. Initial reports suggest the blaze started around two thirty P-M I-S-T in a flat on the twelfth floor of “Shanti Niketan” located at Lokhandwala Complex, Andheri (W), Mumbai- four hundred thousand and fifty three.

unnormalised: Eyewitnesses described chaotic scenes as residents rushed to evacuate the building. Several people are reportedly still trapped inside. Firefighters are battling the flames, which have spread to the 13th and 14th floors.
normalised: Eyewitnesses described chaotic scenes as residents rushed to evacuate the building. Several people are reportedly still trapped inside. Firefighters are battling the flames, which have spread to the thirteenth and fourteenth floors.

unnormalised: "The fire is quite intense," said a local resident, Mr. Sharma, who lives across the street at "Sai Apartments", J.P. Road, Andheri (W), Mumbai - 400058. "We saw thick smoke billowing out of the windows. It's a very scary situation." The building's address is well-known, being near the Infinity Mall.
normalised: "The fire is quite intense," said a local resident, Mister Sharma, who lives across the street at "Sai Apartments", J-P. Road, Andheri (W), Mumbai - four hundred thousand and fifty eight. "We saw thick smoke billowing out of the windows. It's a very scary situation." The building's address is well-known, being near the Infinity Mall.

unnormalised: Authorities have confirmed that emergency services are on the scene and are working to contain the fire and rescue those trapped inside. As of 5:00 PM, reports indicate that several ambulances from nearby hospitals, including Kokilaben Dhirubhai Ambani Hospital located near Four Bungalows, Andheri West, have arrived at the scene. The cause of the fire is currently unknown and is under investigation.
normalised: Authorities have confirmed that emergency services are on the scene and are working to contain the fire and rescue those trapped inside. As of five P-M, reports indicate that several ambulances from nearby hospitals, including Kokilaben Dhirubhai Ambani Hospital located near Four Bungalows, Andheri West, have arrived at the scene. The cause of the fire is currently unknown and is under investigation.

unnormalised: More updates to follow as the situation develops. The local police station at Azad Nagar Police Station, Versova, Andheri West, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400053 are requesting people to avoid the area to allow emergency services access.
normalised: More updates to follow as the situation develops. The local police station at Azad Nagar Police Station, Versova, Andheri West, Mumbai, Maharashtra four hundred thousand and fifty three are requesting people to avoid the area to allow emergency services access.
